image.description: The path of the image watermark has a higher priority than content
image.description_zh: 图像水印的路径优先级高于内容

offset-x.description: Offset of the watermark from the container's x-axis
offset-x.description_zh: 水印与容器 x 轴的偏移量

offset-y.description: Offset of the watermark from the container's y-axis
offset-y.description_zh: 水印与容器 y 轴的偏移量

gap-x.description: Spacing in the horizontal direction of the watermark

gap-y.description: Spacing in the vertical direction of the watermark
gap-y.description_zh: 水印垂直方向上的间距

fullscreen.description: Whether to display watermark in fullscreen mode
fullscreen.description_zh: 是否在全屏模式下显示水印

methods.name: resize
methods.description: This method can be called for redrawing when the watermark attribute changes
methods.description_zh: 当水印属性发生变化时，可以调用该方法进行重绘

slots.name: content
slots.description: The content of HTML Watermark, only supports inline styles, does not support passing in self closing tags, priority higher than content or image attributes
slots.description_zh: HTML 水印的内容，仅支持内联样式，不支持传入自关闭标签，优先级高于内容或图片属性
